verses.verse: <S%H3381>Come<s%> <S%H3381>down,<s%> and <S%H3427>sit<s%> in the <S%H6083>dust,<s%> O <S%H1330>virgin<s%> <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> <S%H3427>sit<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H776>ground:<s%> there is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H3678>throne,<s%> O <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of the <S%H3778>Chaldeans:<s%> for you shall <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3254>more<s%> be <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H7390>tender<s%> and <S%H6028>delicate.<s%>

<S%H3947>Take<s%> the <S%H7347>millstones,<s%> and <S%H2912>grind<s%> <S%H7058>meal:<s%> <S%H1540>uncover<s%> your <S%H6777>locks,<s%> make <S%H2834>bore<s%> the <S%H7640>leg,<s%> <S%H1540>uncover<s%> the <S%H7785>thigh,<s%> <S%H5674>pass<s%> <S%H5674>over<s%> the <S%H5103>rivers.<s%>

Your <S%H6172>nakedness<s%> shall be <S%H1540>uncovered,<s%> <S%H1571>yes,<s%> your <S%H2781>shame<s%> shall be <S%H7200>seen:<s%> I will <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H5359>vengeance,<s%> and I will not <S%H6293>meet<s%> you as a <S%H120>man.<s%>
As for our <S%H1350>redeemer,<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> is his <S%H8034>name,<s%> the <S%H6918>Holy<s%> One of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

<S%H3427>Sit<s%> you <S%H1748>silent,<s%> and <S%H935>get<s%> you into <S%H2822>darkness,<s%> O <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of the <S%H3778>Chaldeans:<s%> for you shall <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3254>more<s%> be <S%H7121>called,<s%> The <S%H1404>lady<s%> of <S%H4467>kingdoms.<s%>

I was <S%H7107>wroth<s%> with my <S%H5971>people,<s%> I have <S%H2490>polluted<s%> my <S%H5159>inheritance,<s%> and <S%H5414>given<s%> them into your <S%H3027>hand:<s%> you did <S%H7760>show<s%> them <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H7356>mercy;<s%> on the <S%H2204>ancient<s%> have you <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H3513>heavily<s%> laid your <S%H5923>yoke.<s%>

And you <S%H559>said,<s%> I shall be a <S%H1404>lady<s%> for <S%H5769>ever:<s%> <S%H5704>so<s%> that you did not <S%H7760>lay<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> things to your <S%H3820>heart,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> did <S%H2142>remember<s%> the <S%H319>latter<s%> end of it.

Therefore <S%H8085>hear<s%> <S%H6258>now<s%> <S%H2063>this,<s%> you that are given to <S%H5719>pleasures,<s%> that <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H983>carelessly,<s%> that <S%H559>say<s%> in your <S%H3824>heart,<s%> I am, and <S%H657>none<s%> <S%H5750>else<s%> <S%H657>beside<s%> me; I shall not <S%H3427>sit<s%> as a <S%H490>widow,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall I <S%H3045>know<s%> the <S%H7921>loss<s%> of children:

But <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> things shall <S%H935>come<s%> to you in a <S%H7281>moment<s%> in <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> the <S%H7921>loss<s%> of children, and <S%H489>widowhood:<s%> they shall <S%H935>come<s%> on you in their <S%H8537>perfection<s%> for the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of your <S%H3785>sorceries,<s%> and for the <S%H3966>great<s%> <S%H6109>abundance<s%> of your <S%H2267>enchantments.<s%>

For you have <S%H982>trusted<s%> in your <S%H7451>wickedness:<s%> you have <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H369>None<s%> <S%H7200>sees<s%> me. Your <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> and your <S%H1847>knowledge,<s%> it has <S%H7725>perverted<s%> you; and you have <S%H559>said<s%> in your <S%H3820>heart,<s%> I am, and <S%H657>none<s%> <S%H5750>else<s%> <S%H657>beside<s%> me.

Therefore shall <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> on you; you shall not <S%H3045>know<s%> from where it <S%H7837>rises:<s%> and <S%H1943>mischief<s%> shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> on you; you shall not be <S%H3201>able<s%> to <S%H3722>put<s%> it off: and <S%H7722>desolation<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> on you <S%H6597>suddenly,<s%> which you shall not <S%H3045>know.<s%>

<S%H5975>Stand<s%> <S%H4994>now<s%> with your <S%H2267>enchantments,<s%> and with the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of your <S%H3785>sorceries,<s%> <S%H834>wherein<s%> you have <S%H3021>labored<s%> from your <S%H5271>youth;<s%> <S%H194>if<s%> so be you shall be <S%H3201>able<s%> to <S%H3276>profit,<s%> <S%H194>if<s%> so be you may <S%H6206>prevail.<s%>

You are <S%H3811>wearied<s%> in the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of your <S%H6098>counsels.<s%> Let <S%H4994>now<s%> the <S%H1895>astrologers,<s%> <S%H8064><s%> the <S%H2374>stargazers,<s%> <S%H3556><s%> the <S%H2320>monthly<s%> <S%H3045>prognosticators,<s%> <S%H5975>stand<s%> up, and <S%H3467>save<s%> you from these things that shall <S%H935>come<s%> on you.

<S%H2009>Behold,<s%> they shall be as <S%H7179>stubble;<s%> the <S%H784>fire<s%> shall <S%H8313>burn<s%> them; they shall not <S%H5337>deliver<s%> <S%H5315>themselves<s%> from the <S%H3027>power<s%> of the <S%H3852>flame:<s%> there shall not be a <S%H1513>coal<s%> to <S%H2552>warm<s%> at, nor <S%H217>fire<s%> to <S%H3427>sit<s%> <S%H5048>before<s%> it.

<S%H3651>Thus<s%> shall they be to you with <S%H834>whom<s%> you have <S%H3021>labored,<s%> even your <S%H5503>merchants,<s%> from your <S%H5271>youth:<s%> they shall <S%H8582>wander<s%> <S%H376>every<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> to his <S%H5676>quarter;<s%> <S%H369>none<s%> shall <S%H3467>save<s%> you.
